home.heading: Reserve your session at The Ring Experience
home.description: Choose your preferred date and create your ring with local artisans.

about.heading: Turn this story into your own memory
about.description: Come to our studio and craft a ring guided step by step by our team.

gemstones.heading: Build your ring around a gemstone you truly love
gemstones.description: Select your favorite tone and cut, then shape the design with us.

gallery.heading: Create your own photo in this gallery
gallery.description: Book the experience and leave with a handmade ring and a real memory.
